Q_small_vitality.name: Small Vitality
Q_small_vitality.memory: //Heart-1602 is recovered from Pit-13|L|Recovered by: Lutekna|L||L|//Heart-1602 is injected with Shamble extract|L|Status: Feared|L||L|//Heart-1602 has begun to generate green motes|L|Status: Feared

Q_large_vitality.name: Large Vitality
Q_large_vitality.memory: //Heart-1473 is recovered from Pit-13|L|Recovered by: Solara|L||L|//Heart-1473 is injected with Zaramech fuel|L|Status: Feared|L||L|//Heart-1473 has begun to generate blue motes|L|Status: Feared

Q_super_vitality.name: Super Vitality
Q_super_vitality.memory: //Heart-1936 is recovered from Pit-13|L|Recovered by: Lutekna|L||L|//Heart-1936 is injected with Serum 31|L|Status: Cracked|L||L|//Heart-1936 is still not beating after 20 hours|L|Status: Failure

Q_quicklove_one.name: Quicklove+
Q_quicklove_one.memory: I can use this to restart a heart that seems far beyond salvageable. But they are never the same.

Q_quicklove_two.name: Quicklove++
Q_quicklove_two.memory: The Eyeric Glyph monsters constantly generate stone hearts. I finally got my hands on one and I was so excited to finally run some tests on it.|L||L|That is until... I discovered that it had the same genetic material as a Zaraden.

Q_quicklove_three.name: Quicklove+++
Q_quicklove_three.memory: Not only was this genetic material 100% Zaraden, it was 100% HER.|L|It was exactly her.|L||L|What does this mean?|L|Can I bring her back?|L|With this, Serum 31 is almost ready.

Q_water_glyph.name: Water Glyph
Q_water_glyph.card: Gain [VAL1] reserve health after every battle

Q_love_dye.name: Love Dye
Q_love_dye.memory: Some monsters can attack with photons. Don't think for a moment that this is as simple as shining a light on you. These are focused beams of pure radiation.|L||L|Every monster is different, but there is a good chance that a radiant monster will not like the void elements.

Q_dark_dye.name: Dark Dye
Q_dark_dye.memory: Some monsters can attack with void. This is a little more complicated than it seems. It's not that they are attacking with nothing... well actually that is what they are doing. You see, void is very very cold and empty and it always wants to be filled. Because of this, void can freeze anything it touches and pull everything into itself.|L||L|A void monster is unlikely to be affected by heat, but light can easily tear through a void.

Q_warm_dye.name: Warm Dye
Q_warm_dye.memory: There are monsters that can attack with heat. It should go without saying, but hot is bad for you. Do not touch!|L||L|Void elements can usually extinguish the flames of a burning monster.

Q_bright_dye.name: Bright Dye
Q_bright_dye.memory: Some monsters will try to electrocute their victims. Running enough electricity through a heart will stop it from beating. It's usually not good for your long term health if your heart stops beating.|L||L|Many Zaramechs have some kind of electrical attack, but their circuits can't handle being overloaded with electricity themselves.

Q_murky_dye.name: Murky Dye
Q_murky_dye.memory: Other monsters can attack with toxic chemicals. I got a few samples and used them to dissolve all sorts of fun stuff. Obviously, I can't test them on a Zaraden, but I did get curious about their effects, so I searched through all the records of monster attacks that I could find. I searched for hours, but I could not actually find a single confirmed fatality. We always hear the stories, but the data does not back it up. Very interesting...

Q_lovestruck.name: Lovestruck
Q_lovestruck.memory: It's only sound.|L|It can't hurt you.|L|It's only sound.|L|It can't hurt you.|L|It's only sound.|L|It can't hurt you.|L||L||shake|Ahhhh!

Q_glow_tonic.name: Glow Tonic
Q_glow_tonic.memory: You drank the glowing one?|L|Good luck sleeping tonight. If your glowing skin doesn't keep you awake, then it will be the fact that you keep attracting the glow mites.
Q_glow_tonic.card: All standard attacks become Radiant Dmg.

Q_cold_tonic.name: Cold Tonic
Q_cold_tonic.memory: Brain freeze?|L|Try frostbite on the back of your eyeballs!
Q_cold_tonic.card: All standard attacks become Void Dmg.

Q_warm_tonic.name: Warm Tonic
Q_warm_tonic.memory: This will make you feel warm even in the middle of a blizzard.|L||L|Wait! That's the one with magma in it!
Q_warm_tonic.card: All standard attacks become Burn Dmg.

Q_spark_tonic.name: Spark Tonic
Q_spark_tonic.memory: How many Zaraden does it take to become a lightbulb?|L||L|Seriously, don't drink that. You will die.
Q_spark_tonic.card: All standard attacks become Zap Dmg.

Q_bitter_tonic.name: Bitter Tonic
Q_bitter_tonic.memory: I put a bunch of random nonsense into that one. I don't know what it would do to you, but I poured it on a plant once.|L|It yelled at me.
Q_bitter_tonic.card: All standard attacks become Toxic Dmg.

Q_glow_ichor.name: Glow Ichor
Q_glow_ichor.memory: I'm afraid of showing love.|L|What if it's too much?
Q_glow_ichor.card: Standard attacks become Radiant|L|[VAL1] Radiant Helpers

Q_cold_ichor.name: Cold Ichor
Q_cold_ichor.memory: I'm afraid of being alone.|L|It's much too cold.
Q_cold_ichor.card: Standard attacks become Void|L|[VAL1] Void Helpers

Q_warm_ichor.name: Warm Ichor
Q_warm_ichor.memory: I'm afraid of being touched.|L|It has hurt me before.
Q_warm_ichor.card: Standard attacks become Burn|L|[VAL1] Burn Helpers

Q_spark_ichor.name: Spark Ichor
Q_spark_ichor.memory: I'm afraid to show myself.|L|What if they don't like me?
Q_spark_ichor.card: Standard attacks become Zap|L|[VAL1] Zap Helpers

Q_bitter_ichor.name: Bitter Ichor
Q_bitter_ichor.memory: I'm afraid of love.|L|What if I don't deserve any?
Q_bitter_ichor.card: Standard attacks become Toxic|L|[VAL1] Toxic Helpers

Q_debris.name: Debris
Q_debris.memory: It's just a piece of random junk that fell from space. It can't possibly grant you a wish.|L||L|Let's try anyways.

Q_staples.name: Staples
Q_staples.memory: Do whatever it takes to hold it together!|L||L|I always knew you could do it!

Q_warp_synapse.name: Warp Synapse
Q_warp_synapse.memory: Warp synapses are the simplest type of synapse since they can only be used to move objects between 2 points in physical space. They usually work in both directions, but they can also be one way. Both Shambles and Zaramechs have been observed manipulating them, seemingly without an external source of power. We can create warp synapses with our own technology, but they require such extreme amounts of power to maintain.
Q_warp_synapse.card: You can warp across the screen

Q_loop.name: Loop
Q_loop.memory: Do you ever wish you could go back in time and do something differently?|L||L|Yeah, neither do I.

Q_armor_heart.name: Armor Heart
Q_armor_heart.memory: I'll always protect my sister! She needs me to be there! No monsters are going to get to her while I'm around!
Q_armor_heart.card: Block the first hit each battle

Q_soul_heart.name: Soul Heart
Q_soul_heart.memory: When all around you is anxiety,|L|When all around you is frustration,|L|Take a moment,|L|Focus your heartbeat,|L|You are still alive.

Q_rage.name: Rage
Q_rage.memory: Sometimes we just gotta let our rage out.|L|Go on. Hit that tower wall.|L||L|Give it a nice four finger love punch!

Q_terror.name: Terror
Q_terror.memory: From the other side, a terror to behold. Pure affection will be unavoidable. Every broken monster part will know, that their opponent had to be so lovable. Take a last look around while you're afraid. She's an indestructible, master of love!

Q_single_polyp.name: Single Polyp
Q_single_polyp.memory: It suddenly gets harder to breathe. My breathing gets faster and faster. Deeper and deeper. Anything to keep that precious air from leaving me.

Q_double_polyp.name: Double Polyp
Q_double_polyp.memory: My breathing gets faster, but it's no use. My throat has closed completely, I imagine.|L|My vision narrows as I look for any sort of escape. But there is nowhere to escape to.

Q_triple_polyp.name: Triple Polyp
Q_triple_polyp.memory: Imagine a bubble surrounding you. All the air in it just for you. Take a deep breath, even if you think it's the last one you can possibly take.|L|Exhale slowly.|L|Do not worry. The bubble will not let you down.|L||L|Breath returns to you.

Q_nightmare.name: Nightmare
Q_nightmare.memory: I had that nightmare again. The one where she finally figures out that I am a wingless. Then she hurts me like the other Zaraden.|L||L|She can clearly see that I'm wingless. Why does she come to see me so often? When is she going to hurt me?
Q_nightmare.card: Gain a panic after the next three battles

Q_chaos_glyph.name: Chaos Glyph
Q_chaos_glyph.card: Random bonus effect after the next 3 battles

Q_chrome_heart.name: Chrome Heart
Q_chrome_heart.memory: When I see my reflection,|L|I hear a voice.|L|It knows how to destroy me.|L|It sounds just like me,|L|But that isn't me.
Q_chrome_heart.card: 1 Chrome Heart that protects your combo

Q_chrome_duo.name: Chrome Duo
Q_chrome_duo.memory: That's not me.|L|Is that me?|L|I can't recognize myself.|L|I've become someone else.|L|I was me,|L|But now she's gone.
Q_chrome_duo.card: [VAL1] Chrome Hearts that protect your combo

Q_chrome_trio.name: Chrome Trio
Q_chrome_trio.memory: You think you're the one in control anymore? Take a look at your reflection!|L||shake|HahAhaHaAhaHAahaAhaHA
Q_chrome_trio.card: [VAL1] Chrome Hearts that protect your combo

Q_inspire1.name: Inspire
Q_inspire1.memory: I want to be able to look up at the stars again. I want to paint the night sky again. The stars inspire me. Especially now that I know more about them. They are so much bigger and farther away than I ever knew was possible.
Q_inspire1.card: All Damage +[VAL1]% after the next three battles

Q_inspire2.name: Extra Inspire
Q_inspire2.memory: I want to see more of Eyeris. She told me there is a place with so many mountains that go on as far as you can see. The sunset radiates such lovely colors upon them.|L||L|Without actually seeing it, I can only paint my best guess.
Q_inspire2.card: All Damage +[VAL1]% after the next three battles

Q_inspire3.name: Super Inspire
Q_inspire3.memory: I had to paint this as fast as I could, so that I'll never forget. This was my view when she took me into the sky!
Q_inspire3.card: All Damage +[VAL1]% after the next three battles

Q_hearten1.name: Hearten
Q_hearten1.memory: I'm painting more than ever! She loves all of it. I need to have a new one ready for the next time she visits.|L||L|I've never had someone else look at my art. At least, not since I was a child.
Q_hearten1.card: Max Health +[VAL1] after the next two battles

Q_hearten2.name: Double Hearten
Q_hearten2.memory: I want to see the snow covered mountains. She said it's so much colder than anything I've ever felt before. It would actually hurt my skin to be there without heavy clothing.|L||L|I don't think I've ever seen clothes before. It's rare for anyone to wear them in this climate.
Q_hearten2.card: Max Health +[VAL1] after the next four battles

Q_hearten3.name: Super Hearten
Q_hearten3.memory: I'm going to climb that tower. I'll do it at night, so no one will see me. I need to see her again.|L||L|No! She obviously never wants to see me again...|L|But she promised...|L|She's hurt me so much.|L|I love her.
Q_hearten3.card: Max Health +[VAL1] after the next three battles

Q_dual_stones.name: Dual Stones
Q_dual_stones.memory: I had never seen a Glyph monster project her zaranoid form. She appeared to be a stone elemental Glyph. She held her hands out and printed a stone heart out of nothing but air!|L||L|I tried to sneak away, but I tripped and fell over something. It was another stone heart...

Q_triple_stones.name: Triple Stones
Q_triple_stones.memory: Boulders were crashing down all around me as I ran. Trees were falling over. My holowings would not activate. I knew that I was in trouble.|L||L|I turned around and pleaded,|L|"I didn't mean to touch it, I'm sorry!"

Q_pile_of_stones.name: Pile of Stones
Q_pile_of_stones.memory: I was so scared, but that's when I noticed her eyes were pouring like faucets. Was she crying?|L|She came closer to me. She grabbed my hand and placed a stone heart in it. Then she put one finger on my chest right where my heart is. Her eyes were still pouring, but she had a slight smile on her face. Before I could react, there was a flash. She was gone.

Q_security.name: Security
Q_security.memory: These friends will always have your back.

Q_heart_shard.name: Heart Shard
Q_heart_shard.memory: I loved every day that she came down to see me.

Q_null_shard.name: Null Shard
Q_null_shard.memory: I know she couldn't visit me every day. She had to keep it secret.

Q_heat_shard.name: Heat Shard
Q_heat_shard.memory: I hadn't felt the warmth of another Zaraden in such a long time before I met her.

Q_spark_shard.name: Spark Shard
Q_spark_shard.memory: It was so exciting when she brought me gifts. They were a small glimpse into that world above.

Q_blight_shard.name: Blight Shard
Q_blight_shard.memory: On some days, she would stay with me even though I was feeling sick.

Q_all_shard.name: All Shard
Q_all_shard.memory: What if I could climb a tower all on my own? What would they think of me up there? I wish I could go visit her instead.

Q_candle.name: Candle
Q_candle.memory: I can always tell when they are around. They look at me from just out of sight. They stare at me from the shadows. They even follow me sometimes. It can be scary, but why do they hide from me? Are they afraid of me?

Q_nightlight.name: Nightlight
Q_nightlight.memory: I caught one of those eyeballed flowers looking right at me. In the moment, I felt the courage to stare back at her. I could sense a longing in that eye. She began to move toward me while passing by a nightlight mushroom. I thought I could see a Zaraden's arm in the light.|L||L|But I just HAD to sneeze at that moment. By the time my eyes opened again, she was gone.
Q_nightlight.card: Reveal [VAL1] extra monster choices for 3 battles

Q_broken_key.name: Broken Key
Q_broken_key.memory: I can't let anyone else in.|L|I just can't.|L||L|How long until they hurt me too?|L|There is no reason to try again.

Q_broken_lock.name: Broken Lock
Q_broken_lock.memory: That's okay, I don't think I really need this anymore. There was never a reason to put a lock on it in the first place.
Q_broken_lock.card: All challenges become simple for 3 battles

Q_rest.name: Rest
Q_rest.memory: Drink some water, okay?|L|I love you.

Q_nap.name: Nap
Q_nap.memory: It was hard to sleep that night. It was so cold and I wasn't used to it yet. But when I woke up, there were a few strange rocks around me. They were carved in the shape of hearts. They were really warm. It felt really nice. Who left those around me?
Q_nap.card: Lower base level by [VAL1] and reroll monsters

Q_snooze.name: Snooze
Q_snooze.memory: I had that nightmare again. The one where I wake up and she is gone. I look all over for her, but I slowly realize that she finally flew away without me.|L||L|I don't know what I would do without her.
Q_snooze.card: Lower base level by [VAL1] and reroll monsters

Q_green_photo.name: Green Photo
Q_green_photo.memory: Wow wow, she's so pretty!|L|I got that green lady with the purple hair. Look at that cute face! She was very mad at me, hehehe, but she was no match for the speed of light.|L||L|Don't tell the others, but she's my favorite.|L|I want to touch her face with my face. Why do I want to do that? I don't know!|L|I wish I could talk to her.
Q_green_photo.card: Reduce attack speed for all monsters

Q_red_photo.name: Red Photo
Q_red_photo.memory: I got that hot lava noodle! I got her just as she came out of the lava, but she got scared and didn't come back out again. Am I really that scary?|L||L|Where should I hide this one? I hope Joule finds it, hehehe.
Q_red_photo.card: Reduce attack damage for all monsters

Q_blue_photo.name: Blue Photo
Q_blue_photo.memory: I got that sad robot lady. The crack on her face makes her look sad. I see her walking around the same place almost every day. She gets really mad at me if I try to move into her walking area.|L||L|I took the photo from just outside of her perimeter. She didn't even react at all. She only stared at me. I stared back for a little bit, but then I got scared and ran away.
Q_blue_photo.card: Reduce fear amount for all monsters

Q_dark_photo.name: Dark Photo
Q_dark_photo.memory: Wow wow, I finally got the invisible lady!|L|She is so hard to see, I wasn't even sure if she was real. All of her photos would come out blank.|L||L|This time, I tried sending some extra ultraviolet beams at her. She lit up blue and I finally got the photo! It was so cold around her, like she was made of ice or something.|L|Hmm, she looks so familiar.
Q_dark_photo.card: Greatly reduce power for all monsters

Q_emerald_luck.name: Emerald Luck
Q_emerald_luck.memory: It doesn't matter what I get. I don't deserve anything anyways.
Q_emerald_luck.card: Reroll all gifts|L|Raise monster attack speed

Q_ruby_luck.name: Ruby Luck
Q_ruby_luck.memory: Why can't I ever have what I want? Is it too much to ask for things to go my way just once?!
Q_ruby_luck.card: Reroll all gifts|L|Raise monster attack damage

Q_sapphire_luck.name: Sapphire Luck
Q_sapphire_luck.memory: It might be something good this time, but what if it isn't? Then I won't know what to do. Maybe I shouldn't try this then.
Q_sapphire_luck.card: Reroll all gifts|L|Raise monster fear amount

Q_topaz_destiny.name: Topaz Destiny
Q_topaz_destiny.memory: "You can't change your destiny."|L||L|That's always the excuse, isn't it? It's destiny, so why even bother trying to change it?

Q_citrine_fortune.name: Citrine Fortune
Q_citrine_fortune.memory: You could lose anything and everything at any moment. All it takes is one accident. You lose a wing and down to The Pit you go. It should terrify you.
Q_citrine_fortune.card: Reroll everything and reveal [VAL1] extra monsters

Q_amethyst_fate.name: Amethyst Fate
Q_amethyst_fate.memory: It is nobody's fate to be alone. Please don't try so hard to be alone. We know it hurts you so much. Ask us to help you.
Q_amethyst_fate.card: +[VAL1] karma|L|Reroll all gifts with higher luck
